AddUserContact.document: This API is used to add the recipient name and email. The returned value is the ID of the successfully added recipient.
AddUserContact.name: Adds the recipient information

CreateDBDiagReportTask.document: This API is used to create a health report and send it via email as configured.
CreateDBDiagReportTask.name: Creates a health report generation task

CreateDBDiagReportUrl.document: This API is used to create a URL for a health report.
CreateDBDiagReportUrl.name: Creates a URL for a health report

CreateKillTask.document: This API is used to create a session killing task.
CreateKillTask.name: Creates a session killing task

CreateMailProfile.document: This API is used to create the email configuration. The input parameter `ProfileType` represents the type of the email configuration. Valid values: `dbScan_mail_configuration` (email configuration of database inspection report) and `scheduler_mail_configuration` (email sending configuration of scheduled task health report). Always select Guangzhou for `Region`, regardless of the region where the instance resides.
CreateMailProfile.name: Creates the email configuration

CreateProxySessionKillTask.document: This API is used to create an async task of killing all proxy node connection sessions and is currently supported only for Redis. The async task ID is the returned value, which can be passed to the API `DescribeProxySessionKillTasks` as a parameter to query the execution status of the session killing task.
CreateProxySessionKillTask.name: Creates a task of killing proxy node sessions

CreateSchedulerMailProfile.document: This API is used to create the regular generation time of health reports and the regular email sending configuration. Pass in the regular generation time of health reports as a parameter (Monday to Sunday) to set the regular generation time, and save the corresponding regular email sending configuration.
CreateSchedulerMailProfile.name: Creates the scheduled task email sending configuration

CreateSecurityAuditLogExportTask.document: This API is used to create a security audit log export task.
CreateSecurityAuditLogExportTask.name: Creates a security audit log export task

DeleteDBDiagReportTasks.document: This API is used to delete health report generation tasks by task ID.
DeleteDBDiagReportTasks.name: Deletes health report generation tasks

DeleteSecurityAuditLogExportTasks.document: This API is used to delete a security audit log export task.
DeleteSecurityAuditLogExportTasks.name: Deletes a security audit log export task

DescribeAllUserContact.document: This API is used to get the information of the recipient in the email.
DescribeAllUserContact.name: Gets the information of the recipient in the email

DescribeAllUserGroup.document: This API is used to get the information of the recipient group in the email.
DescribeAllUserGroup.name: Gets the information of the recipient group in the email

DescribeDBDiagEvent.document: This API is used to get the details of an instance exception diagnosis event.
DescribeDBDiagEvent.name: Gets diagnosis event details

DescribeDBDiagEvents.document: This API is used to obtain the diagnosis event list in a specified time period by risk level, instance ID, etc.
DescribeDBDiagEvents.name: Obtains diagnosis event list

DescribeDBDiagHistory.document: This API is used to get the list of instance diagnosis events.
DescribeDBDiagHistory.name: Gets the instance diagnosis history

DescribeDBDiagReportTasks.document: This API is used to query the list of health report generation tasks.
DescribeDBDiagReportTasks.name: Queries the list of health report generation tasks

DescribeDBSpaceStatus.document: This API is used to query the overview of instance space usage during a specified time period, including disk usage growth (MB), available disk space (MB), total disk space (MB), and estimated number of available days.
DescribeDBSpaceStatus.name: Gets the overview of instance space usage during the specified time period

DescribeDiagDBInstances.document: This API is used to get the instance information list. Please always select Guangzhou for `Region`.
DescribeDiagDBInstances.name: Gets instance information list

DescribeHealthScore.document: This API is used to get the health score and deduction for exceptions in the specified time period (30 minutes) based on the instance ID.
DescribeHealthScore.name: Gets the health score

DescribeMailProfile.document: This API is used to get the email sending configuration, including the email configuration for database inspection and the email sending configuration for scheduled task health reports.
DescribeMailProfile.name: Gets the email configuration

DescribeMySqlProcessList.document: This API is used to query the real-time thread list of a relational database.
DescribeMySqlProcessList.name: Queries the list of real-time threads

DescribeProxyProcessStatistics.document: This API is used to get the session statistics of a single proxy under the current instance, and can only be called in particular environments.
DescribeProxyProcessStatistics.name: Gets the session statistics of a single proxy

DescribeProxySessionKillTasks.document: This API is used to query the result of the session killing task executed by the Redis proxy node. The async task ID (an input parameter) is obtained after the API `CreateProxySessionKillTask` is successfully called. Currently, the only valid value of `product` is `redis`.
DescribeProxySessionKillTasks.name: Queries the status of the session killing task executed by the proxy node

DescribeRedisTopKeyPrefixList.document: This API is used to query the list of top key prefixes for Redis instances.
DescribeRedisTopKeyPrefixList.name: Queries the list of top key prefixes for Redis instances

DescribeSecurityAuditLogDownloadUrls.document: This API is used to query the download link of a security audit log export file. Currently, log file download only provides a Tencent Cloud private network address. Download it by using a CVM instance in the Guangzhou region.
DescribeSecurityAuditLogDownloadUrls.name: Queries the download link of a security audit log export file

DescribeSecurityAuditLogExportTasks.document: This API is used to query the list of security audit log export tasks.
DescribeSecurityAuditLogExportTasks.name: Queries the list of security audit log export tasks

DescribeSlowLogTimeSeriesStats.document: This API is used to get the slow log statistics histogram.
DescribeSlowLogTimeSeriesStats.name: Gets the slow log statistics histogram

DescribeSlowLogTopSqls.document: This API is used to get and sort the top slow SQL statements in a specified time period by the aggregation mode of SQL template plus schema.
DescribeSlowLogTopSqls.name: Obtains the slow SQL template list

DescribeSlowLogUserHostStats.document: This API is used to get the statistical distribution chart of slow log source addresses.
DescribeSlowLogUserHostStats.name: Gets the statistical distribution chart of slow log source addresses

DescribeSlowLogs.document: This API is used to obtain the slow query log details of a SQL template in a specified time period.
DescribeSlowLogs.name: Obtains SQL template details in a specified time period

DescribeTopSpaceSchemaTimeSeries.document: This API is used to get the daily space data of top databases consuming the most instance space. The data is daily collected by DBbrain during a specified time period. The returned results are sorted by size by default.
DescribeTopSpaceSchemaTimeSeries.name: Gets the daily space statistics of top databases during the specified time period

DescribeTopSpaceSchemas.document: This API is used to get the real-time space statistics of top databases of an instance. The returned results are sorted by size by default.
DescribeTopSpaceSchemas.name: Gets the space statistics of top databases

DescribeTopSpaceTableTimeSeries.document: This API is used to get the daily space data of top tables consuming the most instance space. The data is daily collected by DBbrain during a specified time period. The returned results are sorted by size by default.
DescribeTopSpaceTableTimeSeries.name: Gets the daily space statistics of top tables during the specified time period

DescribeTopSpaceTables.document: This API is used to get the real-time space statistics of top tables of an instance. The returned results are sorted by size by default.
DescribeTopSpaceTables.name: Gets the space statistics of top tables

DescribeUserSqlAdvice.document: This API is used to get SQL statement optimization suggestions. It is free of charge for a limited time and will be charged after DBbrain is commercialized.
DescribeUserSqlAdvice.name: Gets SQL statement optimization suggestions

KillMySqlThreads.document: This API is used to interrupt the current session by session ID. It needs to be called twice to commit the session interruption task in two stages. In the pre-commit stage, the stage value is `Prepare`, and the returned value is `SqlExecId`. In the commit stage, the stage value is `Commit`, and `SqlExecId` will be passed in as a parameter. Then, the session process will be terminated.
KillMySqlThreads.name: Kills a MySQL session thread

ModifyDiagDBInstanceConf.document: This API is used to enable/disable instance inspection.
ModifyDiagDBInstanceConf.name: Enables/Disables instance inspection

members.document: Recipient name, which can contain up to 20 letters, digits, spaces, and symbols `!@#$%^&*()_+-=()` and cannot begin with an underscore.

TaskInfo.document: Information about Redis session killing task status

members.document: Async task ID.
members.name: AsyncRequestId

members.document: List of all proxies of the current instance.
members.name: InstProxyList

members.document: Total number of proxies of the current instance.
members.name: InstProxyCount

members.document: Task creation time.
members.name: CreateTime

members.document: Task start time.
members.name: StartTime

members.document: Task status. Valid values: `created` (create), `chosen` (to be executed), `running` (being executed), `failed` (failed), and `finished` (completed).
members.name: TaskStatus

members.document: IDs of the proxies that have completed the session killing tasks.
members.name: FinishedProxyList

members.document: IDs of the proxies that failed to execute the session killing tasks.
members.name: FailedProxyList

members.document: Task end time.
members.name: EndTime

members.document: Task progress.
members.name: Progress

members.document: Instance ID.
members.name: InstanceId

members.document: Total number
members.name: Count

members.document: Statistics start time
members.name: Timestamp

UserProfile.document: Information configured by user, including email configuration.

members.document:
Configured ID
Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: ProfileId

members.document:
Configuration type. Valid values: `dbScan_mail_configuration` (email configuration of the database inspection report), `scheduler_mail_configuration` (email configuration of the scheduled task report).
Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: ProfileType

members.document:
Configuration level. Valid values: `User` (user-level), `Instance` (instance-level). For database inspection emails, it should be `User`. For scheduled task emails, it should be `Instance`.
Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: ProfileLevel

members.document:
Configuration name.
Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: ProfileName

members.document: Configuration details.
members.name: ProfileInfo
